main event: A circular object was observed flying at 800 meters altitude, giving off intense light and leaving a trail of reddish smoke.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 7 seconds,The object was classified as a UFO, along with similar reports from various locations in Europe during the same period,There was a notable increase in UFO sightings throughout Europe in the summer and fall of 1954,Other sightings included a disc-like object in Austria and a mysterious object over Ciampino Air Base in Rome,No photographs or physical evidence were collected during these observations.
sighted object: circular flying object emitting intense light
